    background: #1e2640;
}

  background: rgb(30 38 64 / 55%);
}

  display: none;
}

  display:block
}

  border-color: #FF4B5A !important;
}

    content: "";
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0) !important;
    width: 15px;height: 18px;

}

    margin-left: 5px !important;
    transition: 0.5s ease-in-out;
}
.imgbox figure, .imgbox img {
    width: 100% !important;
}
